name: Yasuyuki Matsushita
content: Yasuyuki Matsushita – CVL@UOsaka HOME > Members > Yasuyuki Matsushita Yasuyuki Matsushita Visiting Professor Multimedia Engineering Graduate School of Information Science and Technology Osaka University Email: yasumat [at] ist.osaka-u.ac.jp → Activities → Publications → GitHub Short bio Yasuyuki Matsushita received his B.S., M.S. and Ph.D. degrees in EECS from the University of Tokyo in 1998, 2000, and 2003, respectively. From April 2003 to March 2015, he was with Visual Computing group at Microsoft Research Asia. In April 2015, he joined Osaka University as a professor. His research area includes computer vision, machine learning and optimization. He is an Editor-in-Chief of International Journal of Computer Vision (IJCV) and is/was on editorial board of IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI), The Visual Computer journal, IPSJ Transactions on Computer Vision Applications (CVA), and Encyclopedia of Computer Vision. He served/is serving as a Program Co-Chair of PSIVT 2010, 3DIMPVT 2011, ACCV 2012, ICCV 2017, and a General Co-Chair for ACCV 2014 and ICCV 2021. He has won the Osaka Science Prize in 2022 and Commendation for Science and Technology by the Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology in 2025. He is a Fellow of IEEE and a member of IPSJ.  * I am leaving Osaka University by the end of September 2024 and join Microsoft Research Asia to open its new research lab in Tokyo. ↑ PAGE TOP CVL@UOsaka ResearchMembersPublicationsAwardNews & TopicsJoin UsFor VisitorAccessLocal (日本語) Language: 日本語 English
